string-array.name: dog_characteristics
string-array.item: Independence is what I look for
Big sound in a small package

resources.string: The domestic dog (Canis familiaris or Canis lupus familiaris) is a domesticated form of wolf. The dog descended from an ancient, extinct wolf, with the modern wolf being the dog\'s nearest living relative. The dog was the first species to be domesticated by hunterâ€“gatherers more than 15,000 years ago, prior to the development of agriculture. Their long association with humans has led dogs to be uniquely attuned to human behavior, enabling an abundant cosmopolitan distribution and to be able to thrive on a starch-rich diet that would be inadequate for other canids.
